pkgmetadata.longdescription: Number and Brightness Image Analysis // Calculation of molecular number and brightness from fluorescence microscopy image series. The software was published in a 2016 paper doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btx434. The seminal paper for the technique is Digman et al. 2008 doi:10.1529/biophysj.107.114645. A review of the technique was published in 2017 doi:10.1016/j.ymeth.2017.12.001.
